ModMetaData.name: Gokusotsu Shougi and Mahjong
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX/muri
ModMetaData.description: Shougi and Mahjong recreation objects as well as the snowmen spun out from the Gokusotsu the Hell Guard Mod, located at: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2892925626. All credit to muri, I just yanked the recreation objects and snowmen.
